page.title: 05 The School
page.content: The school was built in 1895.This is a list of things in the school. Two classrooms, a hall, a kitchen, a practical area, and a television room.The hall, the headteacher's room, and the staffroom were built on 4 years ago.We have a hard playground in front of our school, with a fence around it.We have a main road in front of our school. Our kitchen used to do school dinners but it is not in use any more.Our school has oil fired central heating. The people who work here are 2 full time teachers, 1 part time teacher,2 dinner ladies, 1 secretary/welfare assistant. By the side of the school is a public pathway running from the main road to the field. There is a shed and an under cover area. The field is used for athletics and football and games.
